hero.subtitle: Transforming Businesses with Practical AI Solutions Â· From Leading 300+ International Teams to Building AI-First Solutions

about.title: About Me
about.content:
I connect large-scale operations with advanced AI solutions. After managing 300+ team members from China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam at Topvan Group, I founded ThinkerCafe to democratize AI education and enterprise automation.

My unique background combines international team leadership, deep AI/data science technical expertise, and 10+ years of teaching experience. I don't just implement AI solutionsâ€”I build systems that empower people to work smarter.

I am currently seeking opportunities to bring this combined expertise to enterprise AI consulting and digital transformation projects.

jobs.title: CEO & Founder
points: Led a distributed US-Taiwan team to develop AI education and automation products.
Designed comprehensive AI courses (Personal OS, AI Communication Skills, Visual/System Hacking Series).
Built LINE Bots, automation systems, and AI productivity tools.
Provided enterprise AI solutions and workflow optimization consulting services.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
points: Directly led a 10-12 person team, indirectly managed 300+ members across China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam.
Overseas assignments: Dubai Business Bay (4 months), Clark, Philippines (1.5 years), Makati/BGC (1 year).
Utilized Python and Telegram Bot API to enhance data-driven decision-making.
Managed all operations except finance and retail, reporting directly to the Chairman.

jobs.title: R&D Department Manager
points: Rebuilt team: Recruited new talent and reformed performance evaluations in response to 50%+ employee turnover.
Implemented Scrum development processes and internal/external testing environments.
Developed an operational anomaly notification system, automating processes with JIRA.
Resolved iOS certificate issues and IP blocking problems for in-house applications.

jobs.title: Head of Data Science
points: Established the data science department from the ground up.
Set up a complete environment within one month: Linux, Python, Docker, Jupyter, RStudio.
Predicted player churn and implemented retention strategies.
Detected arbitrage players and compiled quarterly operational reports.

jobs.title: Founder
points: Founded a project-based company, assembling freelance teams based on project needs.
Sanlih E-Television Vidol: Developed a web drama recommendation system.
Chunghwa Telecom: Provided big data Hadoop cluster consulting and operations.
E.SUN Bank: Implemented cross-device member attribution mechanisms.
ITRI College: Analyzed industry talent competency assessments and international corporate job vacancy data.

jobs.title: Big Data R&D Engineer
points: Designed data collection processes and ETL engineering.
Utilized statistical methods for data analysis and decision support.
Semantic analysis of patient diets: Built an emotion lexicon, developed a scoring model, and automated reporting of top five recommended/avoided foods for various diseases.

philosophy.title: Technical Philosophy
philosophy.content: I don't chase 'how many languages I know,' but rather 'how quickly I can solve problems.' In the era of AI collaboration, the focus isn't on writing every line of code by hand, but on: 1) knowing which tool combinations to use 2) being able to design maintainable system architectures 3) understanding how to make AI your development partner

items.title: Physical Therapy Clinic LINE Bot Booking System
items.context: A newly opened clinic, manually handling appointments daily, overwhelmed by phone calls.
painPoints: Spent 2 hours daily manually confirming appointments and making reminder calls
Constant phone calls, reception overwhelmed, clients grew impatient
Lack of systematic management, often forgot reminders or double-booked appointments
deliverables: LINE Bot for automated booking/cancellation/rescheduling, 24/7 availability
Automated reminder notifications, reducing no-show rates
Google Calendar integration, clear overview for reception

outcome.label: Actual Outcome
outcome.description:
Significantly reduced call volume, all appointments moved online
Reception no longer constantly tied to the phone

items.title: University Research Project: TRA Disaster Recovery Analysis
items.context: Researching how long it takes Taiwan Railways Administration (TRA) to resume operations after service disruptions caused by earthquakes and typhoons.
painPoints: TRA's latest news scattered across various sources, manual compilation too slow
Required long-term historical data tracking service suspension/resumption times
deliverables: Automated crawling of TRA's latest news for real-time updates
Structured storage: suspension time, resumption time, cause classification
Provided API for direct data access by the research team
tech: Natural Language Processing (for key information extraction)

academic_review.label: Research Team Evaluation
academic_review.quote: The work is exquisite, data quality is excellent, perfectly meeting research needs.

open_source.label: Open Source
open_source.description: Code publicly available on GitHub for academic research use.
